headline: Is Marriott International (MAR) Pricing Too High After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Marriott International at around US$319.77 is offering fair value or asking too much, you are not alone. The stock’s recent returns are mixed, with a 0.6% decline over the last 7 days, a 1.9% gain over 30 days, and longer term returns of 2.0% year to date, 10.4% over 1 year, 87.1% over 3 years and 164.3% over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Marriott’s position as a major global hotel operator and how investors are weighing its brand strength, asset light...
